channel.title: Go Kure
channel.description: Kure: Type-Safe Kubernetes Resource Generation Kure is a powerful Go library for programmatically building Kubernetes resources, designed specifically for GitOps workflows. Say goodbye to complex templating engines and hello to strongly-typed, composable resource generation. Why Kure? Building Kubernetes manifests for GitOps can be challenging: YAML templating is error-prone and hard to maintain Helm charts add complexity with their templating language Raw manifests lead to duplication and inconsistency Kure solves these problems by providing:
